media.headline: Cabrera's solo homer
media.blurb: CWS@MIL: Cabrera opens scoring with solo home run
media.bigblurb: Melky Cabrera belts a home run over the right-center-field wall to give the White Sox an early 1-0 lead in the top of the 1st

media.player: Tim Anderson Todd Frazier Jacob May
media.headline: White Sox nab Broxton at third
media.blurb: CWS@MIL: May, Anderson relay to nab Broxton at third
media.bigblurb: Keon Broxton clubs a double to deep center field and Jacob May begins the relay, as the White Sox throw him out at third base

media.headline: Nelson fans Frazier
media.blurb: CWS@MIL: Nelson Ks Frazier to start the 2nd
media.bigblurb: Jimmy Nelson gets Todd Frazier to go down swinging to start the top of the 2nd

media.headline: Aguilar's two-run single
media.blurb: CWS@MIL: Aguilar plates two with bases-loaded single
media.bigblurb: With the bases loaded and two outs in the bottom of the 6th, Jesus Aguilar hits a single to drive in two runs and put the Brewers up, 2-1

media.headline: Abreu's solo homer in the 7th
media.blurb: CWS@MIL: Abreu ties game with homer to left-center
media.bigblurb: Jose Abreu crushes a home run over the left-center-field wall to tie the game at 2 in the top of the 7th

media.headline: Nieuwenhuis' solo homer
media.blurb: CWS@MIL: Nieuwenhuis's home run puts Brewers ahead
media.bigblurb: Kirk Nieuwenhuis smacks a home run over the wall in left-center field to put the Brewers ahead, 3-2, in the bottom of the 7th

media.headline: Orf scores on an error
media.blurb: CWS@MIL: Orf comes home on dropped fly ball
media.bigblurb: Kyle Wren lifts a high fly ball to shallow left field which is dropped by Luis Alexander Basabe, and Nate Orf comes home to score

media.headline: Abreu's RBI single
media.blurb: CWS@MIL: Abreu plates Cabrera with a single to left
media.bigblurb: With runners at the corners and nobody out in the top of the 9th, Jose Abreu hits a single to left to bring the White Sox to within one

media.player: Rene Garcia Danny Hayes Nicky Delmonico
media.headline: Hayes' sac fly injures Garcia
media.blurb: CWS@MIL: Hayes ties game with a sac fly to right
media.bigblurb: Danny Hayes lifts a fly ball to Domingo Santana while Nicky Delmonico beats the throw home, but injures Rene Garcia on the slide

media.headline: Wren's walk-off single
media.blurb: CWS@MIL: Wren wins game with a bases-loaded single
media.bigblurb: With the score tied at four and the bases loaded in the bottom of the 9th, Kyle Wren hits a single to right and drives in the winning run

media.headline: Garcia injured in collision
media.blurb: CWS@MIL: Garcia leaves game after play at the plate
media.bigblurb: Rene Garcia leaves the game after a collision with Nicky Delmonico at home plate in the bottom of the 9th

media.headline: Marinez fans Liriano
media.blurb: CWS@MIL: Marinez strikes out Liriano, the side in 7th
media.bigblurb: Jhan Marinez strikes out Leury Garcia, Danny Hayes and finally Rymer Liriano to strike out the side in the top of the 7th

media.headline: Bandy steals second
media.blurb: CWS@MIL: Bandy surprises White Sox with stolen base
media.bigblurb: Jett Bandy moves into scoring position by stealing second base in the bottom of the 9th

media.headline: Swarzak induces double play
media.blurb: CWS@MIL: Cabrera turns two behind Swarzak, ends 5th
media.bigblurb: Anthony Swarzak gets Orlando Arcia to ground to Everth Cabrera, who steps on second and throws to first for the final two outs of the 5th

media.headline: Orf moves to second on error
media.blurb: CWS@MIL: Orf advances on errant pickoff attempt
media.bigblurb: Micheal Ynoa tries to pick off Nate Orf at first base, but the throw gets away from Danny Hayes and Orf advances to second base
